categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: This individual of an unidentified species was an accomplice of a criminal scavenger in 32 BBY. Before the Boonta Eve Classic podrace began, he stole Anakin Skywalker's plasma ignition capacitor for the scavenger, only to be pursued and cornered by Jedi Master Qui-Gon Jinn. The thief pleaded with Jinn not to harm him, and the Jedi Master proceeded to take back the capacitor from the scavenger after killing him in a firefight. Jinn spared the thief's life, and returned the capacitor to Skywalker in time for the race.
He was voiced by Bill E. Martin.
